description.value:
Multiple areas of study come easily to you, allowing you to become well versed in a variety of topics.

Prerequisites: Int 15, Life Science as a class skill, Physical Science as a class skill

Benefit: Whenever you attempt a @Check[type:life-science]{Life Science} or @Check[type:physical-science]{Physical Science} skill check you can treat your number of skill ranks as whichever is higher between the two. You donâ€™t actually gain any additional skill ranks through the use of this ability for the purposes of fulfilling any prerequisites, such as for feats or abilities.

system.requirements: Int 15, Life Science as a class skill, Physical Science as a class skill
